description:
Difficult challenges - a big reward:
Running an aquarium shop is a real challenge! Clients will entrust you with difficult tasks that you have to cope with. In return, a reward awaits you. Spend it on developing your business - buying new species of fish, exotic plants, equipping your store or developing your skills.

Let your imagination run wild:
Create an aquarium in which each fish will want to live. Thanks to the variety of objects in the game, you can implement even the craziest ideas! A green, blooming oasis or raw, antique busts? The choice is yours.

Recycling and ecology:
Every self-respecting entrepreneur cares about his business. Refurbishing and processing aquarium components will save you a lot and take care of the environment.

Underwater dance:
We offer you many species of fish and freshwater plants. Your task is to create an ecosystem that is balanced and safe for the inhabitants of your aquariums. Remember that a slight deviation from the parameters necessary for the survival of one species can be crucial for the survival of another.

A broad perspective:
Run your store the best you can! Take care of the exhibition, sell ready-made projects and carry out individual orders. In the heat of duties, do not forget about your pupils - you are responsible for ensuring their safety, peace and food.
name: Aquarist
intro: Run the best aquarium shop in town! Create, renew, manage, observe. See if you can create an aquarium empire.
